name: miru
description: dev server with livereloading and pretty error parsing and browser<->terminal output synchronization

scripts.build-miru-init-js: browserify miru.init.src.js -o miru.init.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && echo 'success'
scripts.build-livereload: browserify livereload.src.js -o livereload.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && echo 'success'
